cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 1st Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 1st Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A Queen size bed, fully made up with quality linen. Electric blanket,heater and double glazed windows opening onto a terrace overlooking the harbour. Free UNLIMITED WIFI in room and common areas.Free breakfast, spa and bicycle use.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
